def solve(A,n):
 
 
 
 A.sort()
 res = 0
 for i in range(1,n):
  
  res = res + A[i]*A[0]
  
 return res
 
 
t = int(input())

for _ in range(t):
 
 n = int(input())
 
 A=list(map(int,input().split()))
 print(solve(A,n))

# cook your dish here
t=int(input())

def kingship(p,n):
 
 s=0
 m=min(p)
 
 for i in range(0,n):
  s+=p[i]*m
 return s-m*m
for _ in range(t):
 n=int(input())
 p=list(map(int,input().split()))
 
 r=kingship(p,n)
 print(r)

# cook your dish here
t=int(input())

def kingship(p,n):
 
 s=0
 p=sorted(p)
 
 for i in range(1,n):
  s+=p[0]*p[i]
 return s
for _ in range(t):
 n=int(input())
 p=list(map(int,input().split()))
 
 r=kingship(p,n)
 print(r)
